result.arabic_text: وَأۡمُرۡ أَهۡلَكَ بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَٱصۡطَبِرۡ عَلَيۡهَاۖ لَا نَسۡـَٔلُكَ رِزۡقٗاۖ نَّحۡنُ نَرۡزُقُكَۗ وَٱلۡعَٰقِبَةُ لِلتَّقۡوَىٰ
result.translation: 132. Ku amarna salaadda ehelkaaga, oo u samir yeelo gudashada (salaadaha) kuma weydiisaneyno risiq; Annagaa ku irsaaqi. Cidhibta wanaagsan (ee Jannada) waxaa leh kuwa Alle ka cabsada ee iska jira (Cadaabkiisa).
